channel.title: Need help on npc attack back +move
channel.description:
well on my npc........... the problim is......... jad used to fight back but no nc did so i put his attack back off once i did that the npc didnt attack back so i turned random walk false and now they attack back but dont move how do i make it so they can MOVE AND ATTACK BACK
please help been struggling for a while.

item.title: Need help on npc attack back +move
item.dc:creator: @D_T_55 D T 55
item.description:
@D_T_55 wrote:

make walk type into 1 then it wont follow but it will attack back oh and put your jad autospawn in here so i can take a look at it.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 20, 2008, 07:11:07 pm[/size][hr]you could at least say thanks or tell me if i dint fucking work…

item.title: Need help on npc attack back +move
item.dc:creator: @D_T_55 D T 55
item.description:
@D_T_55 wrote:

example:
//------NpcID—CoordX–CoordY–Height–RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption
spawn = 2745 2387 4680 0 3577 3300 3573 3296 2 Tzok Jad

Im not sure what you mean but if you set your rangex1 and y1 to 10 plus the original and range x2 and y2 10 below the original one he will be walking and should auto attack you and attack back.
